name: Set value for Labor Scope attributes
action:
[IF]([LIKE](<*VALUE(CE_Selected_Products)*>,Experion Enterprise System)){
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Is System Network Engineering in Scope?,Is Fieldbus Interface in Scope?,Is Modbus Interface in Scope?,Is Profibus Interface in Scope?,Is EtherNet IP Interface in Scope?,Is OPC Interface in Scope?,Is HART Interface in Scope?,Is Terminal Server Interface in Scope?,Is DeviceNet Interface in Scope?)*>
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is System Network Engineering in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is System Network Engineering in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is System Network Engineering in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is Modbus Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is Modbus Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is Modbus Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is OPC Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is OPC Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is OPC Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is Fieldbus Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is Fieldbus Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is Fieldbus Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is Profibus Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is Profibus Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is Profibus Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is EtherNet IP Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is EtherNet IP Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is EtherNet IP Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is HART Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is HART Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is HART Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is Terminal Server Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is Terminal Server Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is Terminal Server Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]
[IF]([EQ](<*CTX( Container(Labor_details_newexapnsion_cont2).Row(1).Column(Is Devicenet Interface in Scope).GetDisplayValue )*>,Yes)){<*SELECTVALUE(Is DeviceNet Interface in Scope?:Yes)*>}{<*SELECTVALUE(Is DeviceNet Interface in Scope?:No)*>}[ENDIF]}{<*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Is System Network Engineering in Scope?,Is Fieldbus Interface in Scope?,Is Modbus Interface in Scope?,Is Profibus Interface in Scope?,Is EtherNet IP Interface in Scope?,Is OPC Interface in Scope?,Is HART Interface in Scope?,Is Terminal Server Interface in Scope?,Is DeviceNet Interface in Scope?)*>}[ENDIF]
